metadata.title: AI Consulting for Businesses | Malik Magnan
metadata.description: I implement AI solutions that make your business more efficient. Chatbots, automation, data analysis.

hero.headline: I bring
hero.subtitle: I help mid-sized companies save time, reduce costs, and gain competitive advantages with AI solutions. No hype, just results.

about.name: Malik
about.title: AI Consultant & Developer
about.shortBio: I translate complex AI technology into practical business solutions that deliver immediate value.
about.tagline: AI solutions that work. Not just impress.

bio.title: Why Me?
bio.paragraph1: I'm a developer with deep understanding of AI/ML technologies AND business processes. This means: I don't just build technically sound solutions, but ones that integrate into your daily operations.
bio.paragraph2: My approach: Understand first, then implement. Every project starts with a thorough analysis of your processes and goals.

skills.title: Technology Stack
skills.subtitle: Cutting-edge tools for your AI solution.

quality.title: Results-Oriented
quality.description: No experiments at your expense. Only proven solutions with measurable ROI.

simplicity.title: Pragmatic
simplicity.description: The best AI solution is one your employees actually use.

learning.title: Future-Proof
learning.description: I build systems that can grow with your business.

collaboration.title: Partnership
collaboration.description: Transparent communication and knowledge transfer to your team.

services.title: Services
services.subtitle: Concrete AI solutions for your business

chatbot.title: AI Chatbots
chatbot.description: Intelligent chatbots for customer service, internal FAQ, or lead generation. Integration into your existing website or systems.

automation.title: Process Automation
automation.description: Automate repetitive tasks with AI: document processing, email classification, data extraction.

strategy.title: AI Strategy & Consulting
strategy.description: Where can AI have the biggest impact in your company? Together we develop your AI roadmap.

testimonial1.quote: The AI solution revolutionized our customer service. 60% fewer inquiries to the support team.
testimonial1.author: CEO, Mid-sized Company

testimonial2.quote: Professional execution, clear communication, measurable ROI within 3 months.
testimonial2.author: IT Director, E-Commerce

testimonial3.quote: Finally someone who understands AI AND can explain it. No buzzwords, just results.
testimonial3.author: CEO, Tech Startup
